mapper.insert: INSERT INTO YMS_ANAL_HISTORY (KEY, SAVETYPE, FACTORYNAME, DIV, STARTDT, ENDDT, STEPSEQ, LOTTYPE, PRODUCTSPECGROUP, PRODUCTSPECNAME, PROGRAM, TARGET, CHIPSPEC, FRAMENAME, INTENSITY, PL, LOTID, SUBFRAMENAME, CREATETIME, FILEPATH, BYTES, USERID) VALUES (#{key}, #{saveType}, #{factoryName}, #{div}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{stepSeq}, #{lotType}, #{productSpecGroup}, #{productSpecName}, #{program}, #{target}, #{chipSpec}, #{frameName}, #{intensity}, #{pl}, #{lotId}, #{subFrameName}, SYSDATE, #{filePath}, ${bytes}, #{userId})
mapper.select:
SELECT KEY, COMMENTS, FACTORYNAME, DIV, STARTDT, ENDDT, STEPSEQ, LOTTYPE, PRODUCTSPECGROUP, PRODUCTSPECNAME, PROGRAM, TARGET, CHIPSPEC, FRAMENAME, INTENSITY, PL, LOTID, USERID, TO_CHAR (CREATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATETIME, TO_CHAR(BYTES, 'FM999,999,999,999') AS BYTES FROM YMS_ANAL_HISTORY WHERE SAVETYPE = #{type} AND DELYN = 'N'
AND (KEY IN (SELECT KEY FROM YMS_ANAL_HISTORY_SHARE WHERE USERID = #{userId}) OR USERID = #{userId})
AND TRUNC(CREATETIME) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND STARTDT >= #{startDate} AND ENDDT <= #{endDate}
AND ${cond1Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond1Value} || '%'
AND ${cond2Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond2Value} || '%'
AND ${cond3Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond3Value} || '%'
AND ${cond4Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond4Value} || '%'
AND ${cond5Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond5Value} || '%'
AND ${cond6Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond6Value} || '%'
AND ${cond7Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond7Value} || '%'
AND ${cond8Column} LIKE '%' || #{cond8Value} || '%'

SELECT USERID, USERNAME, DEPARTMENT_DESC AS DEPARTMENTNAME FROM POP_USERPROFILE WHERE STATUS IN ('1', '2') AND YMS_USE = 'Y'
AND (USERID LIKE '%' || #{filter} || '%' OR USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{filter} || '%' OR DEPARTMENT_DESC LIKE '%' || #{filter} || '%')
ORDER BY DEPARTMENT, USERID ASC
SELECT A.USERID, B.USERNAME, B.DEPARTMENT_DESC AS DEPARTMENTNAME FROM YMS_ANAL_HISTORY_SHARE A, POP_USERPROFILE B WHERE A.KEY = #{key} AND A.USERID = B.USERID ORDER BY B.DEPARTMENT, A.USERID ASC
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO YMS_ANAL_HISTORY_SHARE A USING DUAL B ON (A.KEY = #{key} AND A.USERID = #{userId}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (KEY, USERID, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME) VALUES (#{key}, #{userId}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
